title: Introducing: Ashley Koett
body:
Adore these two tracks from Colorado’s **Ashley Koett**.

Sure they’re pretty raw and I guess the correct term could be underproduced, but only in the same way that King Krule’s early demos felt that way, whilst being thoroughly engaging and showcasing huge amounts of potential – Koett’s vocal especially is just so full of personality. Check out _white and red_ and _concrete mountains_ below, as well as a feature on a track with Kevin Abstract.

excerpt.full: Adore these two tracks from Colorado’s Ashley Koett. Sure they’re pretty raw and I guess the correct term could be underproduced, but only in the same way that King Krule’s early demos felt that way, whilst being thoroughly engaging and showcasing huge amounts of potential – Koett’s vocal especially is just so full of personality. \[…\]
